location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lord Minto [Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound], Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a set of exchange in favour of Johannes Sarkies & Company in order to meet the disbursements of the Bushire Residency due on 10 July 1812; the date the Residency ceased to be funded by the Bengal Government and authority passed to the Governor of Bombay.
